mapper.select: SELECT UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel, UNIVERSITYLATITUDE AS universityLatitude, UNIVERSITYLONGITUDE AS universityLongitude FROM UNIVERSITY WHERE UNIVERSITYNAME <> '기타'

SELECT U.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, U.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, A.ADMINLEVEL AS adminLevel FROM UNIVERSITY U INNER JOIN ADMIN A ON U.UNIVERSITYSEQ = A.UNIVERSITYSEQ WHERE U.UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{universitySeq} AND A.ADMINID = #{adminID}

SELECT UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq, UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, UNIVERSITYTEL AS universityTel, UNIVERSITYLATITUDE AS universityLatitude, UNIVERSITYLONGITUDE AS universityLongitude FROM UNIVERSITY WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{seq}
SELECT BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory FROM BUSSTOP_CATEGORY WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ = #{seq} AND BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT = 'show'

SELECT BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ AS BusStopDetailCategorySeq, BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYNAME AS BusStopDetailCategoryName FROM BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY WHERE BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = #{seq} AND BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSTAT = 'show'

SELECT BI.BUSINFOSEQ AS BusInfoSeq, BI.BUSINFONAME AS BusInfoName FROM BUS_INFO BI INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_CATEGORY BC ON BC.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = BI.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY BDC ON BC.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ = BDC.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ WHERE BDC.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = #{seq} AND BUSINFOSTAT = 'show'

SELECT B.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq, B.BUSSTOPORDER AS busStopOrder, B.BUSSTOP AS busStop, B.BUSSTOPLATITUDE AS busStopLatitude, B.BUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS busStopLongitude, B.BUSSTOPLINE as busStopLine FROM BUS_INFO BI INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY AS BDC ON BI.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = BDC.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP B ON B.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = BDC.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE BI.BUSINFOSEQ = #{seq}

SELECT L.LOCATIONSEQ AS locationSeq, L.LOCATIONLATITUDE AS locationLatitude, L.LOCATIONLONGITUDE AS locationLongitude, L.LOCATIONTIME AS locationTime, L.DEVICESEQ AS deviceSeq FROM LOCATION L INNER JOIN DEVICE D ON L.DEVICESEQ = D.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS DB ON D.DEVICESEQ = DB.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INFO BI ON DB.BUSINFOSEQ = BI.BUSINFOSEQ WHERE BI.BUSINFOSEQ = #{seq} AND (L.LOCATIONTIME between #{start} AND #{end}) ORDER BY L.LOCATIONTIME ASC
